Text:
Hour 1: A lot of libs and Dems are either angry, confused, or both about Harry Reid's filibuster deal. The Huffington Post's Ryan Grim will explain how the the deal went down and walk through what the plan actually does (and doesn't) do.

Hour 2: Senator Bernie Sanders will discuss his frustration with Reid's weak filibuster reform deal, why he voted against it, and what he realistically expects to be passed through the 113th Congress now.

Hour 3: Finally, comedian and Current TV Host John Fugelsang will recap the week, from Beyonce's lipsyncing, to Hillary's smackdown of Republicans, to the all-you-can-obstruct GOP Congress.
